title: SB Admin 2
name: startbootstrap-sb-admin-2

scripts.copy-libs: mkdir -p public/vendor && mkdir -p public/vendor/datatables && mkdir -p public/vendor/bootstrap && mkdir -p public/vendor/jquery && mkdir -p public/vendor/fontawesome && cp -r node_modules/@fortawesome/fontawesome-free public/vendor/fontawesome && cp -r node_modules/bootstrap/dist public/vendor/bootstrap && cp node_modules/jquery/dist/jquery.min.js public/vendor/jquery && cp node_modules/datatables.net/js/jquery.dataTables.min.js public/vendor/datatables && cp node_modules/datatables.net-bs4/css/dataTables.bootstrap4.min.css public/vendor/datatables && cp node_modules/datatables.net-bs4/js/dataTables.bootstrap4.min.js public/vendor/datatables && cp node_modules/jquery.easing/jquery.easing.min.js public/vendor/jquery-easing

description: An open source Bootstrap 4 admin theme.
author: Start Bootstrap
